result.content:
This examples shows the basics of filling in a form with FitNium[?]

Note: Some of the tests are expected to fail ( i.e show red ) to
demonstrate who to check for failures !!!

variable defined: TEST_SYSTEM=slim

classpath: fitnesse.jar
classpath: fitlibrary.jar
classpath: ./dist/fitnium2.jar
classpath: ./selenium-remote-control-1.0.3/selenium-java-client-driver-1.0.1/selenium-java-client-driver.jar

import
fitnesse.slim.test
fitnesse.fixtures
com.magneticreason.fitnium

script Base Fitnium Fixture
the server is located at localhost
the server is on port 4444
using the browser *firefox start at localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 500 milliseconds
set timeout to 50000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test

Lets first start at the FitNium[?] home page at Magnetic Reason

Exceptions


Expand All | Collapse All
 scriptTable_2_1 
__EXCEPTION__:com.thoughtworks.selenium.SeleniumException: XHR ERROR: URL = http://localhost:8090/tools/fitnium/testpage1.html Response_Code = 404 Error_Message = Not Found
	at com.thoughtworks.selenium.HttpCommandProcessor.throwAssertionFailureExceptionOrError(HttpCommandProcessor.java:97)
	at com.thoughtworks.selenium.HttpCommandProcessor.doCommand(HttpCommandProcessor.java:91)
	at com.thoughtworks.selenium.DefaultSelenium.open(DefaultSelenium.java:335)
	at com.magneticreason.fitnium.api.FitniumSeleniumAPI.startingAtURL(FitniumSeleniumAPI.java:17)
	at com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture.startingAtURL(BaseFitniumFixture.java:300)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at fitnesse.slim.MethodExecutor.callMethod(MethodExecutor.java:47)
	at fitnesse.slim.MethodExecutor.invokeMethod(MethodExecutor.java:31)
	at fitnesse.slim.MethodExecutor.findAndInvoke(MethodExecutor.java:87)
	at fitnesse.slim.FixtureMethodExecutor.execute(FixtureMethodExecutor.java:18)
	at fitnesse.slim.StatementExecutor.call(StatementExecutor.java:155)
	at fitnesse.slim.Statement.callMethodAtIndex(Statement.java:99)
	at fitnesse.slim.Statement.call(Statement.java:92)
	at fitnesse.slim.Statement.execute(Statement.java:72)
	at fitnesse.slim.ListExecutor.execute(ListExecutor.java:36)
	at fitnesse.slim.SlimServer.executeInstructions(SlimServer.java:93)
	at fitnesse.slim.SlimServer.processTheInstructions(SlimServer.java:78)
	at fitnesse.slim.SlimServer.processOneSetOfInstructions(SlimServer.java:69)
	at fitnesse.slim.SlimServer.tryProcessInstructions(SlimServer.java:55)
	at fitnesse.slim.SlimServer.serve(SlimServer.java:30)
	at fitnesse.socketservice.SocketService$ServerRunner.run(SocketService.java:95)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
script Base Fitnium Fixture
starting at URL /tools/fitnium/testpage1.html
check title of current page [JSP snoop page] expected [Magnetic Reason]
check text of element xpath=//h1 [WebApp JSP Snoop page] expected [Fitnium Test Page]
check is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary [false] expected [true]

Complete over kill this bit, buts shows how we can check that the fields are the
atleast editable, or selectable

script Base Fitnium Fixture
check input field name=firstname is editable Exception: scriptTable_3_1
check input field name=midname is editable Exception: scriptTable_3_2
check input field name=surname is editable Exception: scriptTable_3_3

The next check is unreliable unless you know the order of the items, as this call
just gets a comma list of the values from selenium

script Base Fitnium Fixture
check list name=country options Exception: scriptTable_4_1

So its better to use the following way to check for list of values

script Base Fitnium Fixture
check does list name=country contain options Wales,Scotland,Ireland,England,Other Exception: scriptTable_5_1

Enter data into the appropriate fields

script Base Fitnium Fixture
select option Mr in list name=title
enter Keith in input field name=firstname
enter Eugene in input field name=midname
enter Sterling in input field name=surname
enter 10 Lidgett Lane in input field name=address1
enter Skelmanthorpe in input field name=address2
enter Huddersfield in input field name=city
enter West Yorks in input field name=county
enter HD8 9AQ in input field name=postcode
select option Ireland in list name=country
enter 01484 866 033 in input field name=telephone
enter +44 7771 597 630 in input field name=mobile
enter +44 1484 866 033 in input field name=fax
enter keith@magneticreason.com in input field name=email

We would not normally do this, but lets check that all the values
we entered are in the fields

script Base Fitnium Fixture
check value of element name=firstname Exception: scriptTable_7_1
check value of element name=midname Exception: scriptTable_7_2
check value of element name=surname Exception: scriptTable_7_3
check does list name=country have selection Exception: scriptTable_7_4

Now lets submit the form

script Base Fitnium Fixture
click element id=send
wait for page to load for 3 seconds
check text of element xpath=//h1 [WebApp JSP Snoop page] expected [Fitnium Test Page]
check text of element xpath=//div[@id='primaryContent']/div/p Exception: scriptTable_8_4

script Base Fitnium Fixture
click radio button id=form_sexmale
enter 21 in input field name=age
enter This is a description that has no value in input field name=addinfo
click check box name=tsandcs
click check box name=junk

Now lets submit the form again

script Base Fitnium Fixture
click element id=send
wait for page to load for 3 seconds
check text of element xpath=//h1 [WebApp JSP Snoop page] expected [Fitnium Test Page]
check text of element xpath=//div[@id='primaryContent']/div/p Exception: scriptTable_10_4

Test Complete lets close the browser

close the browser Could not invoke constructor for CloseTheBrowser[0]

row.col: [WebApp JSP Snoop page] fail(expected [Fitnium Test Page])
This page contains all the elements neccassary
wait for page to load for
[WebApp JSP Snoop page] fail(expected [Fitnium Test Page])
This is a description that has no value
wait for page to load for
[WebApp JSP Snoop page] fail(expected [Fitnium Test Page])
close the browser error(Could not invoke constructor for CloseTheBrowser[0])

expectation.evaluationMessage: [WebApp JSP Snoop page] fail(expected [Fitnium Test Page])

instructionResult.instruction: [scriptTable_2_4, call, scriptTableActor, isTextPresent, This page contains all the elements neccassary]
[scriptTable_6_5, call, scriptTableActor, enterInInputField, 10 Lidgett Lane, name=address1]
[scriptTable_6_8, call, scriptTableActor, enterInInputField, West Yorks, name=county]

expectation.expected: wait for page to load for
expectation.evaluationMessage: wait for page to load for
[WebApp JSP Snoop page] fail(expected [Fitnium Test Page])

expectation.expected: This is the second page that contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium

instructionResult.instruction: [scriptTable_9_3, call, scriptTableActor, enterInInputField, This is a description that has no value, name=addinfo]

expectation.expected: wait for page to load for
expectation.evaluationMessage: wait for page to load for
[WebApp JSP Snoop page] fail(expected [Fitnium Test Page])

expectation.expected: Congratulations, you are registered for what ever you have just signed up for

expectation.evaluationMessage: close the browser error(Could not invoke constructor for CloseTheBrowser[0])
